MADE FROM LEATHER: Crafted out of leather, our minimalist wallet sleeve combines luxurious style and the trends of today with functionality and durability you can depend on when traveling, shopping, etc.
UNISEX; FAVORED BY MEN and WOMEN: Given their sleek design and smooth leather construction, these RFID sleeves are popular slim wallets for women and men. They make great gift ideas for the travelers in your life!
Product Description:
Product Description
Most RFID blocking sleeves are bulky & difficult to carry when traveling, but this one has been designed with the modern traveler in mind.
Extra slim, lightweight & perfectly portable, our RFID blocking minimalist wallet is preferred among men & women travelers looking to lighten their load while still protecting their identity, credit cards, passport cards, licenses, etc.
Plenty of Room
The Buffway Wallet Features 8 Slot Compartments - Plenty of Room!
✔ 4 slots for holding credit cards, debit cards, bank cards, passport cards
✔ 1 clear window slot with finger glide for ID, work badge or driver's license
✔ 2 side-slip pockets for business cards, membership cards, train cards, etc
✔ 1 middle pocket for cash bills, tickets, receipts, coupons, notes & so on
Minimalist Slim Wallet Specifications:
✔ 3 1/8" x 4 7/16" (1/8” thickness without contents)
✔ Extremely Thin & Lightweight: 1.05oz
RFID Blocking
ABOUT OUR INTEGRATED RFID BLOCKING TECHNOLOGY:
We want to make sure your identity is safe when out traveling, shopping & getting things done.
This is why we've equipped our genuine leather minimalist wallet with a protective layer that blocks 13-14Mhz electronic signals trying to retrieve your personal information.
Thieves use these signaling devices to steal credit card numbers, expiration dates, identifiable details & so much more.
Using an RFID blocking wallet like ours is the easiest & most affordable way to ensure your pertinent info is safe & secure. Though it effectively guards against common radio frequencies, our id window minimalist wallet doesn't have the ability to block 125 KHz signals such as those for hotel room keys & access cards.
Wallets for Men & Women
No other front pocket slim wallet covers all the bases like this one. Don't let this limited-time deal slip away. Order your Buffway RFID Blocking Wallet Sleeve today!

Product Description:
100% Cowhide Leather Wallet
We provide three leather styles for you to choose from: Crosshatch leather, Napa leather and Oil wax leather.
Crosshatch leather is both trendy and stylish, and is currently used by many prestiged leather product brands.
Napa leather renowned for its soft temper, is widely used in wallet production since it was first coined in 1875 in Napa, California.
Vegetable Tanned Leather is a natural and pure leather type which use 100% plant oil without any chemicals during the whole production. Many luxurious leather products also adopt this material for its natural feeling and beautiful look.
RFID Blocking Wallet
Equipped with silver embroidered lining which can block RFID signals, this Travelambo RFID blocking wallet can help you ensure the safety of your ID card and credit/debit card.
This Travelambo front pocket wallet can block RFID signals from cards working at a frequency of 13.56MHz, including:
Credit/debit card
ID card
Driver license
This Travelambo front pocket wallet DOES NOT block RFID signals from cards working at a frequency of 125KHz, including:
Most ID badges
Some hotel/building access cards
Hand Made Minimalist Wallet
Leather product is smooth and soft, sometimes it easily stretches during machine production process. Compared with machine production, we select hand made production for maximum to reduce the rate of leather get stretch. Apart from sewing, which is done with the assistance of professional sewing machine, this Travelambo front pocket wallet is hand made by our experienced craftsmen with the traditional tools: cutting knife, scissor and hammer. We insist that every Travelambo wallet arrive to our customer is in original leather shape with good craftsmanship.
True Unisex
The days of men carrying only bifold wallets and women carrying only clutches are long gone. A man can get this slim wallet out from his front pocket in the bar, a woman can also get this mini card holder out from the back pocket of her slim-fit jeans in the cafe. It's an Adorable gift for someone you love.
Suitable For Any Occasion
Professional design team and a group of free thinking youngsters get together to create our every product. We love any simple and beautiful things. We designed this wallet aim to bring the users more convenience and security. Travelambo Minimalist Wallet has compact and convenient design which is a good accessory for your daily life, travel and business situation.
100% Quality Check Before Delivery
Although hand made wallet has lower rate appear defect than machine production wallet. We insist on check all finished products ONE BY ONE before packing to ensure good quality condition's product is sent to every customer.

Product Description:
Product Description
WISE OWL ACCESSORIES is a culmination of an effort to provide affordable fashion accessories in high quality, made from Real Top Grain Real leather.
We always strive to keep the natural aesthetics of the leather intact when making our products. Touch, smell and feel are vital to any leather products, and if any of these elements are missing from the product, then it takes away its luxurious appeal. We always strive to have these elements in check at all the time, so that when you receive your product you will love its smell and touch and enjoy its softness.
We start right from the beginning of the supply chain. Raw leathers are sourced from local abattoirs, then graded and processed accordingly. We always maintain high standards in Quality and only the fine, Top Grain selection leathers make it through to the final product.
MINIMALIST SLIM BIFOLD WALLETS BY WISE OWL ACCESSORIES
Whether you’re a Marie Kondo devotee or simply can’t stand the look of household clutter, there’s no denying that minimalism is having a moment. Even if you don’t consider yourself much of a neat freak, having a little more organization in your life is rarely a bad thing. Sure, it won’t make every part of your life less hectic, but opting for a minimalist slim wallet instead of a bulky billfold is certainly a good start when it comes to decluttering. A slim wallet slides easily into your pocket, only carries what you need, and makes it easier to access your cards and ID.
If you’re looking for a slim wallet to fit your lifestyle, you have landed at the right place!
REAL LEATHER
All of our wallets are made with the best of materials and are 100% TOP GRAIN REAL LEATHER, and shall turn softer and develop a unique patina with everyday use.

STRONG AND DURABLE

Product Description:
TIMBERLAND WALLET WITH RFID BLOCKING TECHNOLOGY - A slim compact RFID mens wallet with lots of storage, 6 credit card pockets, 2 separate bill pockets, 2 hidden pockets and a clear ID window.

What is RFID? RFID stands for Radio Frequency Identification Denoting, it is the use of radio waves to identify objects carrying encoded chips. This can include credit card information, passport identification or other forms of ID and access cards.

Why Should I Buy a RFID blocking wallet? With credit cards and debit cards moving to RFID Chips, there is a growing concern of identify theft and electronic pickpocketing. Now is the time to protect yourself and upgrade your wallet to a mens leather RFID wallet trifold. Keep your information safe while still looking trendy.

Each Timberland RFID Trifold Wallet for Men Includes:
100% high quality genuine leather with a soft feel
6 standard sized credit card pockets
1 clear id window
A large horizontal cash pocket separated into 2 different sections
RFID blocking protection
2 extra card pockets

The Perfect Mens Money Organizer: Timberland offers a great wallet for men with RFID Blocking. With the function of a large wallet and the benefits of a slim wallet our mens wallet is one of the best mens wallets available.
